lines.text: See, laundering data can be dangerous. You break the law, you go to hell.
Surgery by surgery brotha. Getting more machine than human. How you feel about that?
I didn't have any choice.
Sad, yeah?
At least I'm still alive.
Won't make any difference you no care brotha.
Just do it.
Alright Alex, now this is gonna...
Sting a little? I know.
No, actually it's gonna hurt like a motherfucker.

[screaming]
State of the fucking art, Alex!
Da fucking humans!
[Alex is a cyborg]
How are we gonna get you through the airport metal detectors?
Piece by piece.
You're confused. We're trying to save humankind, and you, you protect the machines... Well no wonder you protect them, you're mostly machine, you're not really human anymore are you?
86.5% is still human.
It took them 6 months to put him back together. Synthetic flesh, bio-engineered organs. It always scared him that they might take out his soul, and replace it with some matrix chip.
You can't handle the job, you've lost the edge. You've become too emotional.
I can't feel anything anymore. You turned me into a fucking machine. I don't know what's right or wrong.
Since when did you care?
You know, maybe you're one smart cop. Maybe too smart for cop brotha. Maybe, just maybe, you're one sharp motherfucker.
That's a lot of maybes.
Look, there's a lot of us working to make a bad world better. Remember that.
What do you care about a better world? You're a cyborg.
I live here too.
It's not over Alex. There are many more of us. More than you can terminate.
But I've been doing a pretty damn good job of it.
Goddamn Cop!
Goddamn terrorist.
It takes more than flesh and blood to be human, Alex.
They intend to replace humans with cyborgs.
Which humans?
All humans, Alex. They have to be stopped, before they start a war between cyborgs and humankind.
While you're a cyborg... Why don't you side with them?
They are wrong.
And that's it?
Isn't that enough?
You see, there's an old saying in this business. 'It pays to be more than human.'
Fuck he's quick.
